definitions.title: n.f.
definitions.body: wisdom;—´[[ח]]: abs. Da 2:30 +, emph. [[תָכְמְתָא]] Da 2:20 +, cstr. [[חָכְמַת]] Da 5:11, Ezr 7:25;—wisdom, attrib. of God Da 2:20; of gods Da 5:11; of man Da 2:30; of God imparted to man Ezr 7:25 (practical wisdom), Da 2:21; = occult knowledge (v. foregoing) imparted to men v:Da 2:23, Da 5:11, Da 5:14.
